TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IExtendPropertySheet

summary.span: 使管理单元组件可以将属性页添加到项的属性表中。

span.span: Enables a snap-in component to add property pages to the property sheet of an item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关使用 IExtendPropertySheet 接口和 Microsoft 管理控制台 (MMC) 的编程的详细信息，请参阅[MMC 程序员指南](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview)。For more information about programming with the IExtendPropertySheet interface and the Microsoft Management Console (MMC), see the [MMC Programmer's Guide](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview).

param.name: handle
param.span: 用于将通知消息路由到适当的 或 的句柄。

span.span: The handle to use to route the notification message to the appropriate or .

param.span: 一个指针，它指向包含关于范围项或结果项的上下文信息的对象上的 。

Adds pages to a property sheet.

Docs.returns: | 返回值 | 说明 | | --- | --- | | S\_OK | CreatePropertyPages 成功添加了属性表页。| Return Value | Description | | --- | --- | | S\_OK | The CreatePropertyPages successfully added the property sheet pages. | | S\_FALSE | CreatePropertyPages 未添加属性表页。| | S\_FALSE | The CreatePropertyPages added no property sheet pages. | | E\_UNEXPECTED | 发生意外错误。| | E\_UNEXPECTED | An unexpected error occurred. | | E\_INVALIDARG | 一个或多个参数无效。| | E\_INVALIDARG | One or more parameters are not valid. |

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关编程的详细信息接口和 Microsoft 管理控制台 (MMC)，请参阅[MMC 程序员指南](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview)。For more information about programming with the interface and the Microsoft Management Console (MMC), see the [MMC Programmer's Guide](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview).

Public Function QueryPagesFor (lpDataObject As IDataObject) As Integer

param.name: lpDataObject
param.span: 一个指针，它指向包含关于范围项或结果项的上下文信息的对象上的 。

span.span: A pointer to the on the object containing context information about the scope or result item.
Determines whether the object requires pages.

Docs.returns: | 返回值 | 说明 | |--- |--- | | S\_OK | 此数据对象的属性存在。| Return Value | Description | | --- | --- | | S\_OK | Properties exist for this data object. | | E\_UNEXPECTED | 发生意外错误。| | E\_UNEXPECTED | An unexpected error occurred. | | E\_INVALID | 参数无效。| | E\_INVALID | The parameter is not valid. | | 任何其他错误代码 | 没有为数据对象提供任何页面。| | Any other error code | No pages are supplied for the data object. |
